entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Armstrong
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:57 PM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -9.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Armstrong Airport 9:05 PM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -9.5°C
Pressure: 100.7 kPa
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -10.2°C
Wind: E 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow or ice pellets and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:56 PM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries mixed with ice pellets. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries or ice pellets in the morning and early in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning and afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:56 PM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning after midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle in the evening and after midnight. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:56 PM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022
